verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> came to me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; I was jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, and I was jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for her with great <S%H1419><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; I am returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, and will dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: and Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8738><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>; and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; There shall yet old men <S%H2205><s%> and old women <S%H2205><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> with his staff <S%H4938><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> for very <S%H7230><s%> age <S%H3117><s%>.

And the streets <S%H7339><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of boys <S%H3206><s%> and girls <S%H3207><s%> playing <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8764><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%> thereof.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; If it be marvellous <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%>, should it also be marvellous <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>? saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; Behold, I will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, and from the west <S%H3996><s%> <S%H8121><s%> country <S%H776><s%>;

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them, and they shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: and they shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, in truth <S%H571><s%> and in righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; Let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, ye that hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, which were in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> was laid <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, that the temple <S%H1964><s%> might be built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8736><s%>.

For before <S%H6440><s%> these days <S%H3117><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8738><s%> no hire <S%H7939><s%> for man <S%H120><s%>, nor any hire <S%H7939><s%> for beast <S%H929><s%>; neither was there any peace <S%H7965><s%> to him that went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> or came in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> because of the affliction <S%H6862><s%>: for I set <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all men <S%H120><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> against his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>.

But now I will not be unto the residue <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> as in the former <S%H7223><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

For the seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be prosperous <S%H7965><s%>; the vine <S%H1612><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and the ground <S%H776><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their dew <S%H2919><s%>; and I will cause the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> to possess <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all these things.

And it shall come to pass, that as ye were a curse <S%H7045><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; so will I save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you, and ye shall be a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, but let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; As I thought <S%H2161><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to punish <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8687><s%> you, when your fathers <S%H1><s%> provoked me to wrath <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, and I repented <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8738><s%> not:

So again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> have I thought <S%H2161><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%> to do well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye not.

These are the things <S%H1697><s%> that ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye every man <S%H376><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> to his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>; execute <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> in your gates <S%H8179><s%>:

And let none <S%H376><s%> of you imagine <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in your hearts <S%H3824><s%> against his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>; and love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no false <S%H8267><s%> oath <S%H7621><s%>: for all these are things that I hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; The fast <S%H6685><s%> of the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month, and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the fifth <S%H2549><s%>, and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%>, and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the tenth <S%H6224><s%>, shall be to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness <S%H8057><s%>, and cheerful <S%H2896><s%> feasts <S%H4150><s%>; therefore love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; It shall yet come to pass, that there shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>:

And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> city shall go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> speedily <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to pray <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8763><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>: I will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also.

Yea, many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and to pray <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8763><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; In those days <S%H3117><s%> it shall come to pass, that ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out of all languages <S%H3956><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, even shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of him that is a Jew <S%H376><s%> <S%H3064><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, We will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with you: for we have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is with you.
